title: Multi GPU Error
body:
I converted my dataset into coco format and modified the contents of the `coco.data` file. When I ran the `python train.py` command, the following error occurred:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 264, in <module>
    var=opt.var,
  File "train.py", line 153, in train
    loss = model(imgs.to(device), targets, batch_report=report, var=var)
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 491, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py", line 139, in forward
    inputs, kwargs = self.scatter(inputs, kwargs, self.device_ids)
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py", line 150, in scatter
    return scatter_kwargs(inputs, kwargs, device_ids, dim=self.dim)
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 35, in scatter_kwargs
    inputs = scatter(inputs, target_gpus, dim) if inputs else []
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 28, in scatter
    return scatter_map(inputs)
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 15, in scatter_map
    return list(zip(*map(scatter_map, obj)))
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 17, in scatter_map
    return list(map(list, zip(*map(scatter_map, obj))))
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 13, in scatter_map
    return Scatter.apply(target_gpus, None, dim, obj)
  File "/home/dongpeijie/miniconda3/envs/yolov3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/_functions.py", line 96, in forward
    output.record_stream(main_stream)
RuntimeError: invalid device pointer: %p0
```
What's the meaning of var? what should I  do?
